var titleMap={"/":"News Feed","/home":"News Feed","/signin":"Sign In","/signup":"Sign Up","/profile":"User Profile","/saved":"Saved Posts","/edit-profile":"Edit Profile","/communities":"Communities","/my-communities":"My Communities","/following":"Following","/devices-locations":"Devices & Locations","/verify-email":"Verify Email","/email-verified":"Email Verified","/block-device":"Block Device","/login-verified":"Login Verified"};/**
 * Returns the title of a page based on its route path.
 * @param {string} path - The path of the page route.
 * @returns {string} The title of the page with the site name appended.
 */export var getTitleFromRoute=function getTitleFromRoute(path){if(titleMap[path]){return"".concat(titleMap[path]," | SocialEcho");}var userProfileRegex=/^\/user\/(\w+)$/;var postRegex=/^\/(my\/)?post\/(\w+)$/;var communityRegex=/^\/community\/(\w+)(\/report|\/reported-post|\/moderator)?$/;if(userProfileRegex.test(path)){return"User Profile | SocialEcho";}else if(postRegex.test(path)){return"Post | SocialEcho";}else if(communityRegex.test(path)){return"Community | SocialEcho";}return"SocialEcho";};
